dct_title_s: Palestine, index to villages & settlements / This map is published by The Palestine Arab Refugee Office ; reproduced by Sami Hadawi, a former Palestine Government Official of the Department of Land Settlement from Palestine Survey Maps and Taxation Records.
dct_description_sm: Shows line of partition 1947, Armistice line of 1949, demilitarized zones, No-Man's land, Arab states, Jewish states, International zone and Jewish possessions as of March 1945. Includes "Schedule of areas (in dundrums*) - approx." Ancillary map: "Southern Palestine. Scale 1:1,000,000." Scale 1:350,000
dct_publisher_sm: New York, N.Y. : Palestine Arab Refugee Office, [1955]
